price: (22) [And it will be said], "Indeed, this is for you a reward, and your effort has been appreciated."
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَكَانَ سَعۡيُكُم مَّشۡكُورًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna hādhā kāna lakum jazāan wakāna saʿyukum mashkūran
